name: Lace Band
description: We have a puff cuff and band featuring a cool halftone pattern with a geometric edge. The other is a lace pattern with shapes floating around the cuff. These bracelets are perfect to wear to work and then keep them on when you go out at night.

name: Vine Cuff
description: These pieces come in two colorways: Dusk, a two color white and blue print and Dawn, a two color orange and yellow print. The patterns feature a blooming vine cuff and band and a growing band and cuff. The flowers are simple and are a lot of the inspiration for the collection.

name: Arrow Pendant
description: This larger pendant showcases colored vinyl, removing it from its record state and showing great layering and color composition. All of the pendants have a gunmetal center circle detail to accentuate the shape of the record. Each chain is woven through all three layers of vinyl records and have gunmetal beads and a chain to compliment the pendants. These organic geometric shapes are inspired by the wind, water, plants & rocks.

name: Compass Earrings
description:
These eight pendants and four sets of earrings are very simple and geometric, layering the gold, blue, and white vinyl with a heavy gunmetal center detail to compliment the gunmetal chain, making this petite piece stand out boldly. These pendants are easy to wear and add a touch of musical sophistication to any outfit.

These Earrings Come In Only Blue

name: Crystal Carabiner
description: All of these pieces use natural vinyl mixed with white, gold and blue colored vinyl. The two keychains are a geometric arrowhead with a single ring and a carabiner with two rings. Each is featured in 2 colors and have gunmetal details. The Wing Pin is a great detail on any growing style, and the Quill Pin looks great as a detail on the lapel.

name: Flower Studs
description: We have two sets of juxtaposed studs with sterling silver backs in two colors: natural record and white. One set features the sun and drop shape and the other set features two floral shapes.

name: Weather Studs
description: We have two sets of juxtaposed studs with sterling silver backs in two colors: natural record and white. One set features the sun and drop shape and the other set features two floral shapes.

name: Stack Rings
description: The five layer rings have one layer of color in the middle sandwiched between a stepping of black vinyl and then white vinyl.

name: Bouquet Brooch
description: The three layer Bouquet Brooch will look great with any floral blazer, shirt or hat.

name: Dawn Earrings
description: These charms are black, white, and gold vinyl record layered to create easily wearable necklaces and earrings. The shapes range from geometric to floral. There are four groups, featuring one set of charm earrings and two charm necklaces with three layered record charms to create a nice vinyl record composition of color.

name: Diffused Flower Pendant
description: The round pendant comes in two color combinations: gold, white, & black; and blue, white, & black. There is an orb shape that has a geometric landscape created with the stepping of the layered vinyl and on the layered tops we put record groove diffused flowers to show growing and to create a cool texture through the grooves.

name: Bright Day Pendant
description: This pendant is reminiscent of looking through your cast iron gate from your brownstone apartment window on a bright day. This piece features five layers of vinyl and three layers of colors with natural black vinyl on the top and the back. This piece has the sun setting over a hill with the sky and layered clouds, with a gunmetal center to the sun.

name: Turntable Arm Clock
description:
" But I prefer to use Milk crates. Why? They are sturdy, stackable, customizable, and portable and *cough cough*.. free." Unknown DJ
We really wanted to reach out to the record collector and lover with this collection. The Milk crate is commonly associated and used to store records for DJ's and collectors. Obviously originally used to transport milk and then often stolen for either personal or business uses. They come in lots of different colors and designs. All very geometrical with amazing patten work. Listening to you favorite records and slowing down to enjoy them is a lifestyle experience . We wanted to create a collection that touched all parts of the record lovers life. We created a Wall Clock, featuring the arm of a turntable playing your favorite track, and then we show all 60 mins in the hour while highlighting  the 33.3 min to show the direct attachment to the love material at hand. We created a wall art piece using all the different types of Milk crate design and stacking them as if it was your studio or apartment.

name: Natural Record Cuff Bracelet
Natural Record Band Bracelet
Mystery Bracelet
Record Sleeve Stationary Sets
description:
Records Stationary Sets
Since we make everything from recycled records this is one of the many uses of our record sleeves or LP Jackets. We created 3 stationary card styles, the cityscape, the turntable, and the ornate. They are sold in sets of 4 and all come with white 4 3/8th x 5 3/4 invitation style envelopes. The set contains 4 random record sleeve cards made from sleeves with images you can laugh at to things you love.

name: Passive Pop up Amplifier IPhone 4/4S and 5
description: Don't you hate when you're outside on adventures or indoors working and there's annoying background sounds stopping you from properly enjoying the music on your phone? These PPA's are inspired by old phonographs, non-electric passive amplification, and pop-up cards. Allows you to just overcome that obstacle.  They fit in your pocket and are easy to put away quickly for those always in a rush, and there is no assembly required. Making them from the record sleeve or LP jacket makes each one completely different and random, but also better for our environment. The images range from things you can laugh at to things you love.  Since we make everything from recycled records this is one of the main uses of our record sleeves. They fit the iPhone 4/4s and 5 and  achieve maximum audio robustness with absolutely zero outside power.

name: iPhone Skin All Record
description:
Reclaimed Iphone Skins 4/4S and 5
We wanted to create a great alternative to our super durable interchangeable vinyl iPhone cases. We created a very durable and strong sticking skin made from real reclaimed vinyl record. We offer an all natural record skin with plain vinyl and then we offer a center label skin showing a partial record label.

description:

name: Record iPhono Cases 4/4S
description:
The iPhono-case from Wrecordsbymonkey is made from real reclaimed vinyl records that are interchangeable back panels for 4 /4S. It's a groovy new spin on a phone case and offers complete protection. 

Includes:
1 case (iPhone 44S)
2 removable vinyl record interchangeable back panels
Color: WHITE
Finish: gloss

*All labels are random, but please let us know what you prefer when it comes to color. 

Please note all products are made to order, typical ship time (turnaround) is 2 weeks after placing order.
